title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - The dialog details have some issues that need to be addressed:
i. Duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page.
ii. The first and second columns could be merged.

OB: 
- The buttons are too small.
- When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.
- When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
- The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
